name: Space escape (Aayush)
description:
Space Escape is a 2D, Top-Down game about an entity who simply wants to watch the view with his friend. 

In this game you will have to go through several rooms (5, to be exact) and solve puzzles that get progressively harder in order to move to the next room. The end goal is to get to the other side of the spaceship to reunite with your patiently waiting friend.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

F to grab interactable objects.
